overview: Set List:  Live At Barrowlands, Glasgow, Scotland, August 25, 1984  1. Shake Dog Shake  2. Primary  3. The Walk  4. The Hanging Garden  5. One Hundred Years  6. Give Me It  7. A Forest  8. Piggy In The Mirror  9. Happy The Man  10. Play For Today  11. The Caterpillar  12. 10:15 Saturday Night  13. Killing An Arab  Bonus Tracks:  Live At Theater De L'Empire, Paris, France, December 8, 1979  14. At Night (‘A Forest’)  15. Three Imaginary Boys  16. Killing An Arab
title: The Cure ‎– Live In Glasgow
